channel.title: Comments on: Contemporary Orthodox Death
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: lawrence kaplan
item.dc:creator: lawrence kaplan
item.description: What about the growing popularity of "upsheren" in Modern Orthodox cirles? Same thing in my view.
item.content:encoded: What about the growing popularity of “upsheren” in Modern Orthodox cirles? Same thing in my view.

item.title: By: AS
item.dc:creator: AS
item.description: In part this may result from death increasingly becoming a deviation from normality that takes place outside of our everyday environs instead of a normal part of life.
item.content:encoded: In part this may result from death increasingly becoming a deviation from normality that takes place outside of our everyday environs instead of a normal part of life.
